item.title: Introducing my Grey Hacker Bag of Fun
item.description:
Throughout my many years of hacking I have accumulate so many resources: books, scripts, tools, how-to, etc!

I decided to make everything available for you in this github repo, and indexed my theme:

  • CTFs and WARGAMES
  • CRYPTOGRAPHY
  • FORENSICS
  • LINUX HACKING
  • MEMORY EXPLOITS
  • VULNERABILITIES AND EXPLOITS
  • NETWORK and 802.11
  • REVERSE â€¦
item.dc:creator: Marina von Steinkirch
